TEXT.S:
Surinameu Surinamesa i labu nu tebanan atu timulan a Amilika (Cong-nan-mey-cuo ), itiza i 4 00 N, 56 00 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 163,820 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 156,000 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 7,820 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 585,824. kakalukan umah sa 0.50%, kilakilangan umah sa 94.60%, zumaay henay umah sa 4.90%
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Paramaribo.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 25 bulad 11 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung) ayza sa ci Chan Santokhi, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihca 7 bulad 3 demiad.
kiwkay nu Suriname
Surinamekunhekuo itidai Na-maicuoamisan, amis micapi tu Ta-siyungtimulan micapi tu Brazil (Pa-si )waliyan micapi tu France (Fa-kuo ) nu Guyana (Kua-ya-na ), nutipan mitepal tu Guyana (Kua-ya-na )u Na-mia-cuokanatal linmun a tademaw nu kanatal, knatal nu ngangan mialatu nu itidaay a yin-cu-min nu Surinamea tademaw a ngangan. 19541975 nina kanatal malumanay a ngangan nu Netherlands He-lam (nu Guyana (Kua-ya-na ), naw Netherlands He-lanitidai Na-mia-cuoanikuwawnan nu liwan nu babalaki, cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku sepat (1954) mala Netherlands He-lanwankuo nu hekal a bayuay anikuwanan, cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku lima (1975) a mihcaan amisiteked.
Surinameamica aw lala' haw u tademaw haw ku sakasilsil nu ngangan, saadidi'ay namin nu Na-mia-cuoa kanatal, nu Si-pan-ciucaay kaw nuanisakaputan a niyadu'ay, nu tapang misakamuay tu Netherlands He-lana sasakamuen. 13% suodu u Pa'la'ma'puonnu Surinamekakaydaan nu nanum nu caculilan nu balunga a sasiwbayan. u binacadan ku Suriname, kamu, pina kunipisincian a kanatalan, tademaw nu Mu-se-linmiala tu Surinamea tademaw tu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (13%) a kilacan, tu kilacan mikiyadahay tu Amilikana kanatal.[1]
likisi3,000 nuayawan nu si-yun tulu a malebut (3000) a mihcaan, Surinamea niyadu' idaw tu ku tademaw muenengan itida', itidaay nu muenengay a yuncumin, satabakiyay nu binacadan u micapiay tu bayu nu pahabaya tu cacana a papahabayan u A-la-wawa tademaw, atu maheka micumuday nu midebungay a tademaw, pacunaay tu balunga a binacadan a Caribbean (Cia-le-pi a tademaw ) a tademaw. 1650--Lord Willoughby nina tusaay a angangan nu binacadan, itini i kacaledesan nu udaudan a kilakilangan idaw ku adidi'ay aniyadu'an nu binacadan. katukuh i cacay a malebut enem a lasubu lima a bataan (1650) a mihcaan , miteka tu sayaway nu tayniay a Europe (O-cuo ) tademaw, tawyaay a Pa-pa'-duocun-du ci Wey-Le-Bi cue-se (, Lord Willoughbymililidaay tu Yinkelisi (Ing-kuo ) mabulaway tayni i Surinamepatideng tu misatadasay nu Europe (O-cuo ) malimaday a tademaw. ·Abraham Crijnsen1667Treaty of Breda caay ka tanes nikuwanan nu Yinkelisi (Ing-kuo ) debungan nu Ya-puola-han. ke'lan-sen (Abraham Crijnsen (·) mililiday tu He-lanmabulaway nu hitay amidebang, nina ni kalepacawan katukuh tu cacay a malebut enem a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku pitu (1667) a mihcaan tu saka tusa nu IngHeanikalepacawan tu hedek kiya siwantan, tawya masasulit ku Ing-kuoatu Netherlands He-lantu pulieta nika sasulitan tu cudad (Treaty of Breda, ), itini i He-lanNetherlands itida Man-ha-dun-subalpatideng tu angngan nu sapikuwaw tu " baluhay a Amu-sete'-dan"atu Ing-kuomalaliyun tu Suriname, paangangan han misumada tu Heu Kay-ya-na.
sipakayda i Henu-kay-ya-naatu Cia-le-pi-bayua duma nu pinaay a nikalimadan nu tademawan a subalan, He-lanNetherlands pu'tan nuheni ku tawyaay a kanatal nu angangan nu misangay tu Lanmuaepah, Europe (O-cuo )) a tademaw namaka Abilikapacumit tu katuuday a tubing tayniitini a niyadu' mikuli, namakayda hida ku lingantu nu Fia-cuoNa-maa tademawan. 17991816 cacay a malebtu pitu a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku siwa (1799) a mihcaan , sipakayni i He-lanNetherlands maala nu Napuolunnmililitay tu Fa-kuomidebung, Ing-kuoa tademaw malingatu alaen nu Surinameamikuwan, nika i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku enem (1816) a mihcaan ci Na-puo-lun kanatalmalawpes satu sipabeli aca tu Netherlands He-lan. 1863 amica ku Ingkuoapuyu kuni pikuwan tu Surinamepahutin tu lumeniay a tademaw, nika patalumaenac ku Netherlands He-lanmikuwan tu Suriname, katukuh i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku tulu (1863) a mihcaan tu nikudan mihapu tu kalung amilawpes sa, sisa sadikuday ku Netherlands He-lansadikuday miales tu kalung nu kawawan nu Europe (O-cuo ) a kanatal.[2]
kakitidaanPaLa-MaLi-Puo (, Paramaribo) Paramaribo tapang tusu u Pala-mali-puo "Paramaribo"atu biyaway nu niyadu' mialatu kanatal nu pangkiw nu tademaw, itini a mueneng, mapacudad i pulung nu kanatala nisakaputan nu cudada nu liwan namakababalakiay nuni sulitan a ngangan, sakahemekan sa nu laylayan.
nutipanay a dadipasanBigi Pan nutipan a dadipasan kitidaan nu ayam maud kunikasi nganganan, Bigi Pan saka lihalay a dadiputen a kitidaan mala tataydaan nu midangan nu tademawan
waliay a dadipasanwali a kitidaan nu malimaday ni palumaan tu kilakilangan, katukuh ayda cukaymasen tu, idaw kuni alesan atu nipipecian. mililis tu dadipasan, maadih numita i Si-Ta-si-yunnu bilanga picedekan nu dadibuan a bayu.
sakaudipnuaw malukay henay ku Surinamea angangan a kanatal, masumad mala ba'ba'tuwan nikasilaculan a kanatal, aydanu satabakiyay nu kitakidan a li-fan-tusakatahekalan, u li-fan-tuu angangan nu lainlisakae'timan nu kakatahekalan.
lala' atu demiad75% Surinameu masabuyuay atu apuuay a buyan, nama amis a dadipasan apuyu ku lala', pasayda i timulan haymaw sa a talakaw ku buyu', kilangkilangaan mikiyadah tu kanatal nu lalaan tu pitu a bataan idaw ku lima a kilac (75%), u kacaledesan a maudaday a kilangkilangan a demiad. ; Surinameamisan mitepal tu Ta-si-yung, timulan atu Pa-simababiyaw, walian atu Kay-ya-namalalitin, nutipan atu Fa-kuonu Kua-ya-namababenis, uyda a cacay atu Fa-kuonu Kay-ya-namalalitin tu Ma-luo-ni sawaca talawadaw, madademec henay tu aalawan tu lilisan, atu Kay-ya-nalilisan a bayuan maaalaw henay.
kaudadan a kilangkilangan nu SurinameSipaliwini Surinamea labu nu niyadu' u Ya-ma-sina kitidaan, mamin matahepu' nu kacaledesan a maudaday a kilangkilangan. nutipan timuan u "Sipaliwini" nu kacaledesan nu lutuklutukan a kitidaan. Julianatop1280Brokopondo i teban atu nutipan u buyubuyu'an, nika satalakaway a buyu' u Julianatop makaala tu cacay a malebut tusa alasubu walu a bataan (1280) a lawat ku talakaw. katuuday nu Ma-cuonu In-ti-ana tademaw atu Ma-luna tademaw itini namin maudip. katuud henay ku masa mukasiay kuni ka udipan. Brokopondo nina banaw han satabakiay nu kitakit a sauwacan.
